name: High Floor-Ocean View! 2 Bed/2 Ba/1 Pkg WBT#2302
summary: - INSTANT BOOK! If your dates are available, you can book instantly! - Nightly Rates Include TAX!  NO RESORT FEES! - Our "Cleaning Fee" includes Departure Cleaning, Accidental Damage Protection, and Reservation Fee! Full ocean view from large balcony/lanai. Waikiki Beach is just steps away from the front entrance! Over 1000 Sq Ft! 2 Bedrooms / 2 Baths / 1 Parking. Washer/Dryer in unit. No resort fees. No charge for parking.  Nightly rate INCLUDES TAX! (日本語対応可能)
space: (3-night minimum) Feast on these incredible, unobstructed ocean views! Photos do NOT do this beautiful vacation rental justice! LIVING AREA: - 46" smart flat screen TV  - Queen sleeper sofa  - Interior Dining area - sq. ft. lanai/balcony with table and chairs for outside dining.  - Central A/C - Washer/dryer.  KITCHEN: - Full kitchen with dishwasher and microwave and newer appliances  MASTER BEDROOM/BATH: - Cal King bed  - 40" smart flat screen TV - Master bath (with hand-held shower wand) GUEST BEDROOM: - 2 extra long Twin beds (can be made into King on request) - 32" flat screen TV SECOND BATHROOM: - Shower/tub combination with hand-held shower wand YOUR RENTAL INCLUDES:  - FREE PARKING for one vehicle (Garage height is 6-2" and will NOT fit shuttle-size vans) - FREE WiFi - FREE Netflix - FREE local calls and long distance to U.S. mainland and Canada. This non-smoking accommodation sleeps 6; a 7th person is permitted at an additional $25/day using a twin-size roll-away bed.  WAIKIKI

neighborhood_overview: The beaches in Waikiki are right across the street (!) and shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues in Waikiki are all easily accessible.
notes: PLEASE NOTE:  The "Daily Rate" includes Tax!  NO Resort Fees! Included in the "Cleaning Fee" is departure cleaning, reservation fee and Accidental Damage Program fee.   CHECK-IN - Once you’re in Honolulu, you will need to make a phone call to arrange a time for your personal check-in.  A cell phone is preferred in case the property manager needs to call you back.    EARLY CHECK-IN/LATE CHECK-OUT: Because a previous guest may check out of the condo at 11am the day of your arrival, the only way to guarantee an early check-in (8am or later) is to reserve the condo for an additional day.  Likewise, we will do our best to accommodate late check-out requests but as the next guest may check in at 3pm the day of your departure, we cannot guarantee a late check-out unless you reserve the condo for an additional day.
transit: Public transportation is readily available, extremely reliable, and located right outside the building on Kalakaua Ave!
interaction: Our property manager will meet you at the condo for your personal check-in!  Your property manager is also your "go-to" person should you have any questions or need maintenance during your stay.   Download our FREE Hospitality app so you can learn what Oahu has to offer and unlock the secrets for a having great time during your stay!  You'll find info about your vacation rental, weather, restaurants, activities and event recommendations . . . it will even help you locate your vacation rental using your phone's GPS!     The iTunes App Store link for the app:    (Website hidden by Airbnb)  The (Hidden by Airbnb) Play link is:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: The Principal Guest, must be 21 or over in order to make a Reservation, must be present during the entire stay and is completely, solely, and unequivocally responsible for his/her personal actions as well as the actions, both financially and physically, of other guest occupants during the dates of stay.

host.host_about:
ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

reviews.comments: Fantastic place, will definitely come back again. The resort, amenities, Staff, and location is all 5 star and I travel a lot so have a frame of reference.  Byron was very helpful and even gave us beach chairs to use while we were there. You won't be disappointed if you stay here!
Very close to the beach and shopping stores/foods...clean and comfortable rooms for family!

What a well position and well equipped condo, right down to sun chairs for the beach, although bathrooms were dated and bedlinen was tired. Pull out sofa bed has seen better days. Balcony view was spectacular. Captain Cook resorts were wonderful with communications and the staff at the tower were very kind and welcoming. Be sure you understand that any reference to building works probably mean major jack hammering, drilling and building noise 8.15am - 5pm, Mon - Sat.

This apartment is in a fantastic location with an amazing view! 
Would definitely recommend this apartment! Loved our stay here, check in was easy and Byron was lovely.
You can expect to be treated Royally. Great view, great amenities and great location.

Wonderful place and fantastic view. Everything ran smoothly from check in to check out . Could have stayed on that balcony for the whole holiday
This was hands down my best experience  whit an Air BNB vacation everything was exactly what it was supposed to be and more

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Waikiki Beach Tower #2302. The property was even better than anticipated - clean and well supplied, superb location, and kind and helpful staff made it truly memorable. The two bedroom, two bath condo was ideal for us and our two small children, with plenty of room to spread out. We cooked breakfast there every morning and so enjoyed starting our days on the lanai. The beach directly across the street was perfect for our small children, and we were an easy stroll to many restaurants, shopping and activities. Walking distance from the Waikiki aquarium was nice too. The view truly cannot be beat. This was a wonderful spot to stay, we can't wait to come back.
